cards.name: Armory
cards.ruleText: Level 2: Your Soldiers get +1/+1. Level 4: Your Soldiers have first strike. (Creatures with first strike deal damage first in combat. The opposing creature only gets to strike back if it survives.)

cards.name: Assemble the Army
cards.ruleText: Move all unmarked Soldiers from your cities into your army. The Soldiers are not marked for moving.

cards.name: Barracks
cards.ruleText: Level 3: Your Soldiers cost 1 less to play. Level 5: Put a Soldier from your hand into your army.

cards.name: Battering Ram
cards.ruleText: All Soldiers you control get +2/+0 and have overrun until end of turn.

cards.name: Bearer
cards.ruleText: Whenever I deal damage to a city, you may put a Soldier from your hand into a city you control. First Strike - I deal damage first. The opposing creature only strikes back if it survives.

cards.name: Borg's Keep
cards.ruleText: Level 1: Sacrifice a resource card for every creature you control. Level 3: After your combat phase, unmark all creatures in your army and have a second combat phase.

cards.name: Conscript
cards.ruleText: When I come into play, you may search your deck and reveal any number of Soldiers. Shuffle your deck and put the soldiers on top of your deck in any order.

cards.name: Dimensional Pocket
cards.ruleText: Choose one: deal 1 damage to a target city, or deal 3 damage to 1 target creature, or deal 1 damage to 3 target creatures.

cards.name: Footsoldier
cards.ruleText: When I come into play, you may pay 1 for each Footsoldier in play. If you do pay, then search your deck for a Footsolidier and put it into your army. Shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Mentor
cards.ruleText: When I come into play, you may search your deck for a soldier and put it in your hand. Shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Mercenary
cards.ruleText: First Strike - In combat, I deal damage first. The opposing creature only strikes back if it survives. Sudden - I can be played directly into your army. If I have attacked this turn, put me in the graveyard during your discard phase.

cards.name: Mounted Eagle
cards.ruleText: Flying - Only creatures with flying and ranged can defend against me. I get +2/+1 when blocking creatures without flying.

cards.name: Revenge
cards.ruleText: Creatures you play this turn have blood vengeance (they come into play with x +1/+0 counters, where x is equal to the damage dealt the previous turn by target opposing creature). Salvage 5 - You may pay 5 resources to return me to your hand from the graveyard.

cards.name: Seat of the Throne
cards.ruleText: Target city gains 3 defense points and can only sustain 1 damage each turn. Destroy all other cities you control.

cards.name: Spearman
cards.ruleText: All unmarked Soldiers in your army must attack during your combat phase. Battle Scream 1 - When I attack, all other attacking creatures get +1/+0.

cards.name: Squad Leader
cards.ruleText: When I come into play, reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Put each revealed Soldier in your hand and put any other card on the bottom of your deck.

cards.name: Trebuchet
cards.ruleText: m, Mark two Soldiers you control, deal 5 damage to target creature. The marked Soldiers and I do not unmark in your next two unmark phases.
